headline: Is CoStar (CSGP) Using Its New $1.5 Billion Buyback To Redefine Its Growth Story?
summary: In early January 2026, CoStar Group announced 2026 guidance calling for US$3.78 billion to US$3.82 billion in revenue and US$0.42 to US$0.52 in diluted EPS, alongside net income of US$175 million to US$215 million. The company also completed a US$500 million repurchase plan and approved a new US$1.50 billion buyback program, highlighting a sharper focus on capital returns and Homes.com investment efficiency. We’ll now examine how CoStar’s new US$1.50 billion share repurchase plan reshapes...
